THE PURPOSE OF THE FAST PROGRAM IS TO STRENGTHEN THE TECHNOLOGICAL COMPETITIVENESS OF SMALL BUSINESS CONCERNS IN EVERY STATE. CONGRESS HAS FOUND THAT THERE IS MUCH VARIANCE WITHIN STATE TECHNOLOGY PROGRAMS THAT FOSTER ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AMONG SMALL HIGH-TECHNOLOGY FIRMS. THEREFORE, THIS PROGRAM INTENDS TO IMPROVE THE PARTICIPATION OF SMALL TECHNOLOGY FIRMS IN THE INNOVATION AND COMMERCIALIZATION OF NEW TECHNOLOGY; THEREBY ENSURING THAT THE UNITED STATES REMAINS ON THE CUTTING EDGE OF RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT IN THE HIGHLY COMPETITIVE ARENA OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

UTSA FEDERAL AND STATE TECHNOLOGY (FAST) PARTNERSHIP PROGRAM
SUPPORT MISSISSIPPI'S SMALL TECHNOLOGY-BASED COMPANIES TO BETTER COMPETE FOR SBIR AND STTR PROGRAMS, PARTICULARLY WOMEN-OWNED, SOCIALLY AND ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED MINORITY BUSINESSES.

CREATE A SUCCESSFUL SBIR / STTR PROGRAM IN THE MIDLANDS REGION WITH THREE KEY ELEMENTS 1) REGULAR WORKSHOPS IN ORDER TO EDUCATE INTERESTED PARTIES ABOUT THE PROGRAM AND TO IDENTIFY HIGH POTENTIAL APPLICANTS, 2) ONE-ON-ONE PROPOSAL SUPPORT FOR BOTH PHASE I AND PHASE II PROPOSALS FOR HIGH POTENTIAL SBIR/STTR CANDIDATES, AND 3) BUSINESS SUPPORT FOR COMPANY FORMATION, OPERATION AND CUSTOMER DISCOVERY
FOSTER (FOCUS ON SBIR/STTR TEACHING, EQUITY AND RESULTS)
HAWAII TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION - FAST FY 2020

TO CONDUCT OUTREACH THAT IS FOCUSED ON DIVERSIFYING THE PIPELINE OF POTENTIAL SBIR/STTR APPLICANTS, TO TRAIN SCIENTISTS AND RESEARCHERS HOW TO LAUNCH INNOVATION-BASED STARTUPS, AND TO MENTOR INNOVATORS AS THEY SUBMIT SBIR/STTR PROPOSALS AND MANAGE THE RESULTING FUNDING TO GROW THEIR BUSINESSES.
UNIVERSITY OF ARKANSAS ASBTDC FAST PROJECT
SBIR/STTR TO SMALL WOMAN-OWNED, DISADVANTAGED, AND GEOGRAPHICALLY UNDERREPRESENTED TECHNOLOGY COMPANIES THROUGHOUT OHIO
TO INCREASE THE PARTICIPATION OF SMALL AND UNDERREPRESENTED FIRMS IN THE INNOVATION AND COMMERCIALIZATION OF HIGH-RISK TECHNOLOGIES BY LEVERAGING THE SBIR AND STTR PROGRAMS
FAST 2020 SBIR/STTR OUTREACH
NEBRASKA BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT CENTER TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
SUPPORT THE DEVELOPMENT AND GROWTH OF ENTREPRENEURIAL COMPANIES BY PROVIDING RESOURCES, GUIDANCE, CONNECTIONS, AND SUPPORT REQUIRED FOR SUSTAINED COMMERCIAL SUCCESS
MARYLAND TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION (TEDCO)- FAST FY 2020 SBIR/STTR PROPOSAL LAB
FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR SMALL BUSINESSES IN CONNECTICUT
